column5: Heard rumor this weekend that a new World Record Non Typical was taken in Iowa recently. Does anybody have any information on this?
Do a web search for the "Albia buck" shot by a 15 year or 14 year old. Score is like 319? Larry

[font color=green size=3][b]The "Albia" buck was shot in the youth season earlier this fall. I don't recall the score but there's quite a bit of info. in the deer hunting forum on www.fishtheriver.com
Its cabin Fever setting in. Cant fish so I like to scope on other monsters.
It was in the Amish newspaper. An Amish youth shot it during his first season of hunting. The youth was a close relative to one of our Amish neighbors.
North American Whitetail has a nine page article about this in it this month. They also show live photos of the deer that the boys father and two uncles have taken over the past three years.

This is a great story . It shows how persistence and dedication can result in success. The best thing about it is that it tells the story of how the faimly that hunts together stays together. Take a youngster hunting ...the rewards are good for both of you...Deer or no Deer.
